plot: A man hikes through the Ventana Wilderness in search of a male Russian Black Boar. The plan is to tranquilize the large, and potentialy dangerous, animal and have it airlifted to a zoo ...
title: Adventure in Ventana
plot_es: A man hikes through the Ventana Wilderness in search of a male Russian Black Boar. The plan is to tranquilize the large, and potentialy dangerous, animal and have it airlifted to a zoo ...
plot_en: A man hikes through the Ventana Wilderness in search of a male Russian Black Boar. The plan is to tranquilize the large, and potentialy dangerous, animal and have it airlifted to a zoo ...
